languages.text: "А правда... она уродливая и беспощадная. Я псайкер. Мои способности с каждым днем все больше выходят из под контроля. А значит и уйти мне предстоит как псайкеру — уродливо и беспощадно. Я могу только надеяться, что это, по-крайней мере, будет так охренительно и героически, что вы об этом еще веками своим внукам байки травить будете, хех! Спасибо, что помогли мне понять это, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "А правда... она уродливая и беспощадная. Я псайкер. Мои способности с каждым днем все больше выходят из под контроля. А значит и уйти мне предстоит как псайкеру — уродливо и беспощадно. Я могу только надеяться, что это, по-крайней мере, будет так охренительно и героически, что вы об этом еще веками своим внукам байки травить будете, хех! Спасибо, что помогли мне понять это, {name}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "The reality of the situation is ugly and merciless. I'm a psyker. My abilities are getting more and more out of control by the day. Which means I'll go out like any psyker should — it'll be ugly and merciless. Best I can hope for is that it'll be so fragging awesome and heroic that you'll be telling stories of it to your grandchildren for ages, hah! Thank you for helping me realise this, {name}."
languages.original_text: "А правда... она уродливая и беспощадная. Я псайкер. Мои способности с каждым днем все больше выходят из под контроля. Я могу только надеяться, что это, по-крайней мере, будет так охренительно и героически, что вы об этом еще веками своим внукам байки травить будете, хех! Спасибо, что помогли мне понять это, {name}."

Which means I'll go out like any psyker should — it'll be ugly and merciless. Best I can hope for is that it'll be so fragging awesome and heroic that you'll be telling stories of it to your grandchildren for ages, hah! Thank you for helping me realise this, {name}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “现实总是那么丑陋、那么残酷。我是个灵能者，我的能力正在一天天失去控制。也就是说，到最后，我会像其他灵能者一样一命呜呼，命运就是这么丑陋、这么残酷。我猜，我最多只能指望自己干了一大堆不得了的英雄事迹，光是讲我的故事，就能让你们的子子孙孙听上几百年，哈！谢谢你让我意识到了这件事情，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "The reality of the situation is ugly and merciless. I'm a psyker. My abilities are getting more and more out of control by the day. Which means I'll go out like any psyker should — it'll be ugly and merciless. Best I can hope for is that it'll be so fragging awesome and heroic that you'll be telling stories of it to your grandchildren for ages, hah! Thank you for helping me realise this, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “现实总是那么丑陋、那么残酷。我是个灵能者，我的能力正在一天天失去控制。也就是说，到最后，我会像其他灵能者一样一命呜呼，命运就是这么丑陋、这么残酷。我猜，我最多只能指望自己干了一大堆不得了的英雄事迹，光是讲我的故事，就能让你们的子子孙孙听上几百年，哈！谢谢你让我意识到了这件事情，{name}。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «La realidad es incómoda y cruel. Soy una psíquica. Mis capacidades escapan a mi control un poco más con cada día que pasa. Eso significa que mi final será como el de todos los psíquicos: incómodo y cruel. Lo mejor que puedo esperar es que sea tan espectacular y heroico que cuentes historias sobre él a tus descendientes durante generaciones, ¡ja! Gracias por ayudarme a entenderlo, {name}».
languages.original_text: "The reality of the situation is ugly and merciless. I'm a psyker. My abilities are getting more and more out of control by the day. Which means I'll go out like any psyker should — it'll be ugly and merciless. Best I can hope for is that it'll be so fragging awesome and heroic that you'll be telling stories of it to your grandchildren for ages, hah! Thank you for helping me realise this, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «La realidad es incómoda y cruel. Soy una psíquica. Mis capacidades escapan a mi control un poco más con cada día que pasa. Eso significa que mi final será como el de todos los psíquicos: incómodo y cruel. Lo mejor que puedo esperar es que sea tan espectacular y heroico que cuentes historias sobre él a tus descendientes durante generaciones, ¡ja! Gracias por ayudarme a entenderlo, {name}».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Die Lage ist hässlich und gnadenlos. Ich bin Psionikerin. Meine Fähigkeiten geraten täglich noch schlimmer außer Kontrolle. Und das bedeutet, dass ich so abtreten werde, wie eine Psionikerin es tun sollte — es wird hässlich und gnadenlos werden. Ich kann nur hoffen, dass es so unverschämt großartig und heldenhaft wird, dass Ihr noch Euren Enkeln davon erzählt, ha! Danke, dass Ihr mir geholfen habt, das zu erkennen, {name}."
languages.original_text: "The reality of the situation is ugly and merciless. I'm a psyker. My abilities are getting more and more out of control by the day. Which means I'll go out like any psyker should — it'll be ugly and merciless. Best I can hope for is that it'll be so fragging awesome and heroic that you'll be telling stories of it to your grandchildren for ages, hah! Thank you for helping me realise this, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lage ist hässlich und gnadenlos. Ich bin Psionikerin. Meine Fähigkeiten geraten täglich noch schlimmer außer Kontrolle. Und das bedeutet, dass ich so abtreten werde, wie eine Psionikerin es tun sollte — es wird hässlich und gnadenlos werden. Ich kann nur hoffen, dass es so unverschämt großartig und heldenhaft wird, dass Ihr noch Euren Enkeln davon erzählt, ha! Danke, dass Ihr mir geholfen habt, das zu erkennen, {name}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「現実は醜く無慈悲なものね。私は異能者。能力は日に日に制御不能になっている。つまり、いずれは他の異能者と同じく終わりを迎えるということ…醜くて無慈悲な形でね。なら私の望みは、せめて孫の代まで語り継がれるような、素晴らしく、英雄的な終わり方にすることだわ！あなたのおかげで気づくことができたのよ、{name}」
languages.original_text: "The reality of the situation is ugly and merciless. I'm a psyker. My abilities are getting more and more out of control by the day. Which means I'll go out like any psyker should — it'll be ugly and merciless. Best I can hope for is that it'll be so fragging awesome and heroic that you'll be telling stories of it to your grandchildren for ages, hah! Thank you for helping me realise this, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「現実は醜く無慈悲なものね。私は異能者。能力は日に日に制御不能になっている。つまり、いずれは他の異能者と同じく終わりを迎えるということ…醜くて無慈悲な形でね。なら私の望みは、せめて孫の代まで語り継がれるような、素晴らしく、英雄的な終わり方にすることだわ！あなたのおかげで気づくことができたのよ、{name}」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Voyons les choses en face : la situation est catastrophique. Je suis une psyker. Je perds chaque jour un peu plus le contrôle de mes talents. Ce qui signifie que je vais finir comme tous les autres psykers : dans le sang et la douleur. Le mieux que je puis espérer, c'est que ma mort sera tellement spectaculaire et héroïque que vous la raconterez encore et encore à vos petits-enfants. Ha ha ! Merci de m'avoir aidée à le comprendre, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "The reality of the situation is ugly and merciless. I'm a psyker. My abilities are getting more and more out of control by the day. Which means I'll go out like any psyker should — it'll be ugly and merciless. Best I can hope for is that it'll be so fragging awesome and heroic that you'll be telling stories of it to your grandchildren for ages, hah! Thank you for helping me realise this, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Voyons les choses en face : la situation est catastrophique. Je suis une psyker. Je perds chaque jour un peu plus le contrôle de mes talents. Ce qui signifie que je vais finir comme tous les autres psykers : dans le sang et la douleur. Le mieux que je puis espérer, c'est que ma mort sera tellement spectaculaire et héroïque que vous la raconterez encore et encore à vos petits-enfants. Ha ha ! Merci de m'avoir aidée à le comprendre, {name}. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Durumun gerçekliği çirkin ve acımasız. Ben bir ruhsezerim. Kabiliyetlerim günden güne kontrolden çıkıyor. Bu da sonumun her ruhsezerle aynı, yani çirkin ve acımasız olacağı anlamına geliyor. En büyük umudum, çağlar boyunca torunlarınıza anlatabileceğim muhteşemlikte ve kahramanca bir sonum olması olabilir. Bunun farkına varmama yardım ettiğin için teşekkürler {name}."
languages.original_text: "The reality of the situation is ugly and merciless. I'm a psyker. My abilities are getting more and more out of control by the day. Which means I'll go out like any psyker should — it'll be ugly and merciless. Best I can hope for is that it'll be so fragging awesome and heroic that you'll be telling stories of it to your grandchildren for ages, hah! Thank you for helping me realise this, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Durumun gerçekliği çirkin ve acımasız. Ben bir ruhsezerim. Kabiliyetlerim günden güne kontrolden çıkıyor. Bunun anlamı da sonumun her ruhsezerle aynı olacağı, yani çirkin ve acımasız. Umut edebileceğim en güzel şey, sonumun muhteşem ve kahramanca olması. Çağlar boyunca torunlarınıza anlatabileceğiniz hikâyelerle dolu olması, hah! Bunun farkına varmama yardım ettiğin için teşekkürler {name}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
